name: Doomed Space
description:
A top down space shooter with arcade like sounds, graphics and game play. It still is in development so updates will be uploaded during development. It can be played coop (not online)! Please give some feedback or a comments as i would love to implement ideas from gives feedback.

Menu music: 

 https://opengameart.org/content/and-the-console-hit-the-floor-electronic

 (credits: Pro Sensory)

Game music: 

https://opengameart.org/content/space-shooter-music

 (credits: Oblidivm)
